sys_openapi_operation.name: Assigns person groups to an asset.
sys_openapi_operation.serialized_operation:
{"fName":"Assigns person groups to an asset.","fOperationId":"updatePersonGroupLinks","fDescription":"Assigns person groups to an asset. The request body contains a list of ids of person groups that should be assigned to the asset. The following rules apply:
  • This operation is only available for active assets with an assignment widget.
  • The specified list of person groups represents the desired state of person group assignments. Person groups in the list that were not yet assigned to the asset, will be assigned. Person groups that were assigned to the asset but do not appear in the list, will be unassigned.
  • If any errors occur while (un)assigning person groups, the response code will still be 200, and the errors will be listed in the response body.


| Permission | Remarks | | --- | --- | | Operator | With write permission for the asset type | | Person | No access |","fPath":"/assetmgmt/assets/templateId/{templateId}/{assetId}/assignment/personGroups","fHttpMethod":"PUT","fDeprecated":false,"fRequest":{"fRequired":true,"fContents":[{"fMediaType":"*/*","fSchema":{"fName":"request3177679455","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/IdList","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}]},"fResponses":[{"fStatusCode":"200","fDescription":"successful operation","fContents":[{"fMediaType":"application/json","fSchema":{"fName":"responseapplicationjson5420231155","fReferencedName":"#/components/schemas/LinkResults","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"object"}}],"fHeaders":[]},{"fStatusCode":"404","fDescription":"Possible causes:
  • The specified asset template does not exist.
  • The specified asset template is archived.
  • The specified asset template does not contain an assignment widget.
  • The specified asset does not exist.
  • The specified asset is archived.
","fContents":[],"fHeaders":[]}],"fParameters":[{"fName":"templateId","fDescription":"The template id specifying the type of the asset.","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"templateId1521789726","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"uuid","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]},{"fName":"assetId","fDescription":"The id of the asset to assign the person groups to.","fRequired":true,"fDeprecated":false,"fAllowEmptyValue":false,"fAllowReserved":false,"fParameterType":"path","fExplode":false,"fStyle":"simple","fContents":[{"fSchema":{"fName":"assetId8052943516","fExclusiveMaximum":false,"fExclusiveMinimum":false,"fUniqueItems":false,"fRequired":[],"fEnum":[],"fType":"string","fProperties":[],"fOneOf":[],"fFormat":"uuid","fNullable":false,"fReadOnly":false,"fWriteOnly":false,"fDeprecated":false,"fGlideType":"string"}}]}]}
